name: min1d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, if(c0[≤]c1, c0, c1)[≤]c0, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cif(c0, c1, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: The minimum of two numbers is less than or equal to the first. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
